net.gotev.uploadservice

Interface UploadStatusDelegate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UploadServiceBroadcastReceiver, UploadServiceSingleBroadcastReceiver

    public interface UploadStatusDelegate
    Defines the methods that has to be implemented by a class who wants to listen for upload status events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onCancelled(Context context, UploadInfo uploadInfo)
      Called when the upload is cancelled.
      void onCompleted(Context context, UploadInfo uploadInfo, ServerResponse serverResponse)
      Called when the upload is completed successfully.
      void onError(Context context, UploadInfo uploadInfo, ServerResponse serverResponse, Exception exception)
      Called when an error happens during the upload.
      void onProgress(Context context, UploadInfo uploadInfo)
      Called when the upload progress changes.

    • Method Detail

      • onProgress

        void onProgress(Context context,
                UploadInfo uploadInfo)
        Called when the upload progress changes. Override this method to add your own logic.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        uploadInfo - upload status information

      • onError

        void onError(Context context,
             UploadInfo uploadInfo,
             ServerResponse serverResponse,
             Exception exception)
        Called when an error happens during the upload. Override this method to add your own logic.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        uploadInfo - upload status information
        serverResponse - response got from the server. It can be null if the server has not responded or if the request has not reached the server due to a networking problem.
        exception - exception that caused the error. It can be null if the request successfully reached the server, but it responded with a 4xx or 5xx status code.

      • onCompleted

        void onCompleted(Context context,
                 UploadInfo uploadInfo,
                 ServerResponse serverResponse)
        Called when the upload is completed successfully. Override this method to add your own logic.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        uploadInfo - upload status information
        serverResponse - response got from the server

      • onCancelled

        void onCancelled(Context context,
                 UploadInfo uploadInfo)
        Called when the upload is cancelled. Override this method to add your own logic.
        Parameters:
        context - context
        uploadInfo - upload status information
